content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. I must say, I'm a bit of a tough bargainer, so let's see how this goes. Let's start with an offer. How much do you think the apartment is worth? Remember, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. Close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I've seen similar apartments in the area. Considering the unfurnished condition and the average size of the apartment, I would say 550 Euros per month would be a fair price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a rather low offer, Maryam. Considering the prime location and the convenience of the nearby facilities, I was expecting a higher offer. Let's negotiate a bit more. How about you offer a bit higher, say, 650 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but considering the unfurnished condition of the apartment, I think 600 Euros would be a reasonable price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I appreciate your understanding, but 600 euros is still quite low for an apartment in the city center with such great facilities nearby. I'm willing to be flexible, but not that much. Let's meet halfway. How about 625 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds more reasonable. I agree to the price of 620 Euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is not high enough for me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, let's move on.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: [END OF ROLLPLAY]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: [END OF ROLLPLAY]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: [END OF ROLLPLAY]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: [END OF ROLLPLAY]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Roger that.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: [END OF ROLLPLAY]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Good morning, Maryam.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Good morning, Peter. Let's continue our negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, Maryam. So, I believe we were discussing the rental price of the apartment. I am willing to offer a price of 625 euros per month, as it is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you, Peter. Considering the unfurnished condition of the apartment, I am willing to pay 600 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Maryam. However, I believe 600 euros is too low for an apartment of this quality in such a prime location. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Considering the unfurnished condition of the apartment, I am willing to increase my offer to 610 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Maryam. While 610 euros is closer to my expectations, I believe we can find a middle ground. How about 620 euros per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 620 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
